languages.text: "Я... поспешил и применил к вашему судну регламент, что привык задействовать на других кораблях. Я виноват, что неверно оценил обстановку, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Виноват. Я решил, вы захотите узнать о том, что происходит у вас за спиной".

languages.text: "I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Я... поспешил и применил к вашему судну регламент, что привык задействовать на других кораблях. Я виноват, что неверно оценил обстановку, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."
"I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."
"I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."
"I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."
"I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「その…気が急いて、他の船で慣れ親しんでいる規則をそのままあなたの旗艦に適用してしまいました。状況を誤って判断した私の責任です、ローグトレーダー」
languages.original_text: "I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「その…気が急いて、他の船で慣れ親しんでいる規則をそのままあなたの旗艦に適用してしまいました。状況を誤って判断した私の責任です、ローグトレーダー」

languages.text: "Ben... Acele ettim ve diğer gemilerde uygulamaya alıştığım kuralları burada da uyguladım. Durumu yanlış değerlendirmişim Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Acele içerisindeydim ve bu nedenle diğer gemilerde uygulamaya alıştığım kuralları sancak geminize de uyguladım. Durumu yanlış değerlendirmişim Hür Tacir.

languages.text: «Me he... precipitado y aplicado las regulaciones a las que estoy acostumbrado de otras naves a su nave insignia. Lamento haber malinterpretado la situación, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Me he... precipitado y aplicado las regulaciones a las que estoy acostumbrado de otras naves a su nave insignia. Lamento haber malinterpretado la situación, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: “我……是我太着急了，我把其他舰船上的惯例做法用在了你的旗舰上。是我判断错误，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “我……是我太着急了，我把其他舰船上的惯例做法用在了你的旗舰上。是我判断错误，行商浪人。”

languages.text: « J'ai agi hâtivement en suivant les protocoles appliqués d'ordinaire sur les vaisseaux autres que les vôtres. Je reconnais avoir mal évalué la situation, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai agi hâtivement en suivant les protocoles appliqués d'ordinaire sur les vaisseaux autres que les vôtres. Je reconnais avoir mal évalué la situation, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Ich ... war in Eile und habe auf die Regularien zurückgegriffen, die ich von anderen Schiffen kannte. Es war mein Fehler, die Situation falsch einzuschätzen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "I... was in a rush and applied the regulations I'm accustomed to using on other vessels to your flagship. It was my fault for misjudging the situation, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... war in Eile und habe auf die Regularien zurückgegriffen, die ich von anderen Schiffen kannte. Es war mein Fehler, die Situation falsch einzuschätzen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
